name: scrawling
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
scrawl
to write something quickly, without trying to make your writing tidy or easy to read: I scrawled a quick note to Judith and put it under her door. Someone had scrawled graffiti across the wall. Synonym
scribble
